text: Wildflower Album Listing "I Don't Wanna Know" (Track 9) "Always on Your Side" (Track 10) "Where Has All the Love Gone" (Track 11) "Always on Your Side" is a 2006 song by Sheryl Crow featuring Sting. It is the third single from fifth studio album Wildflower. It went to number 2 in Canada, number 30 in Hungary and number 35 in the United States. It was nominated for a Grammy award in 2007. == References == Category:2006 songs Category:Sheryl Crow songs Category:Sting (musician) songs
title: Always on Your Side
